dishes.name: Podvarak in sac
dishes.description: Is a traditionally prepared dish that is cooked slowly in an earthen pot, with the addition of aromatic spices and natural ingredients.

dishes.name: Beans in sac
dishes.description: Beans are cooked with dried meat, bacon or sausages, with the addition of onions, garlic, bay leaves and paprika, which achieves a perfect balance of aromas.

dishes.name: Fresh cabbage in sac
dishes.description: Fresh cabbage is stewed with meat such as pork, beef or chicken, with the addition of onions, carrots, peppers and spices such as pepper, bay leaves and allspice.
